metadata.title: CVE-2018-11319 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: Syntastic (aka vim-syntastic) through 3.9.0 does not properly handlesearches for configuration files (it searches the current directory up topotentially the root). This improper handling might be exploited forarbitrary code execution via a malicious gcc plugin, if an attacker haswrite access to a directory that is a parent of the base directory of theproject being checked. NOTE: exploitation is more difficult after 3.8.0because filename prediction may be needed.

criterions.comment: vim-syntastic package in bionic is affected and needs fixing.
